overview.en: BEYOU CHAIN is a pan-entertainment chain based on smart contracts. With a decentralized structure, it directly links the constituent molecules of the entire game ecological chain to achieve direct docking, non-destructive circulation and point-to-point payment of individual values. Throughout the BEYOU CHAIN ecosystem, game developers and players around the world are able to turn the value they produce into their own revenue.
overview.zh: BEYOU CHAIN是基于智能合约打造的泛娱乐公链。它以去中心化的结构，直接将整个游戏生态链上的组成分子有机地链接起来，实现个体价值的直接对接、无损流通和点对点支付。在整个BEYOU CHAIN生态中，全球的游戏开发者与玩家，能够让自己所产出的价值转化为自身的收益。
